H0.text: Help the plant to get moisture is the most likely purpose of thorns on a plant.

H1.text: Anchor the plant in the ground is the most likely purpose of thorns on a plant.

H2.text: Protecting the plant from harm is the most likely purpose of thorns on a plant.

H3.text: Support of the stems and branches is the most likely purpose of thorns on a plant.

A4.text: The predominant function of thorns, spines, and prickles is deterring herbivory in a mechanical form.

A5.text: In some cases, spines have been shown to shade or insulate the plants that grow them, thereby protecting them from extreme temperatures.
